field.name: summary
field.value: Type "Char" and "VarChar" Generating error when using ActiveRecordStarter.CreateScheme()

field.name: description
field.value:
see the following defination:
[Property("cardno",NotNull=false,ColumnType="Char",Length=30)] public string CardNumber { get { return cardNumber; } set { cardNumber = value; } }
when using ActiveRecordStarter.CreateScheme() to generate the Database scheme, the result will be : cardno varchar(30)
the correct result should be : cardno char(30)
these is a mistaken between "varchar" and "char"
But if you change the NotNull to true, it will works right. like this: [Property("cardno",NotNull=true,ColumnType="Char",Length=30)] public string CardNumber { get { return cardNumber; } set { cardNumber = value; } }
the upper defines will got a right result.
